Concepting

Content Management

My Creative Process

All of my UI/UX and design projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for.

1

Discuss The Project

Set a meeting either face to face or online to discuss what it is you would like to achieve.

2

Brainstorming & Concept

Look to see what your competitors are doing. What are their strengths and weaknesses when it comes to their online presence?

3

UI/UX Planning

Plan out what the overall user experience will be like. Single page application? Shopping cart? Mobile first? I've got you covered.

4

Execute

Lay down the code to make all the ideas come to life.
